signature: double ptSegDistSq(double, double, double, double, double, double)

enhanced_by.method_name: ptSegDist(double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods calculate distances related to line segments, with ptSegDistSq returning the square of the distance.

enhanced_by.method_name: relativeCCW(double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: relativeCCW is used internally within ptSegDistSq to determine the relative position of a point with respect to a line segment, which is a prerequisite for distance calculations.

enhanced_by.method_name: linesIntersect(double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double)
enhanced_by.reason: linesIntersect checks if two line segments intersect, which can be used to set up edge cases where intersections affect distance calculations.
